body.name: Great Boy Handheld Game Console for Kids Preloaded 270 Classic Retro Games with 3.0'' Color Display and Gamepad Rechargeable Arcade Gaming Player (Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 19 hrs 29 mins
features: 💦NEW VERSION－Fashionable color matching design.Free with preloaded 270 classic games and with a gamepad.Join the joystick with the same function as the direction button, you can experience the fun of arcade.Link gamepad and TV,you can also enjoy the games with your companions.

💦LARGER and CLEARER SCREEN－3.0 inches HD display, ensuring portability, while also taking into account the comfort of the games. Not too bulky or too small. Tailored for children, Of course, as an adult gamers also can find pleasure in it. In order to prevent the screen from being scratched during production, the screen surface is covered with a protective film. It is normal to have scratches on the protective film. Please tear it off before use.

💦HOOK UP to TV－Support two players, complimentary a gamepad.Link the game console with the AV cable (in the package) to the TV to get a bigger screen. Both adults and children can be immersed in the joyous world of the game.

💦RECHARGEABLE－Built-in a rechargeable lithium battery, providing a steady stream of energy for your child's happiness. It also eliminates the parents from buying and replacing batteries frequently. Use the universal micro USB charging interface to make charging easier. It only takes 1-2 hours to fully charge and you can play for 5 hours.

💦ABSOLUTELY STUNING－This game console is suitable for birthday, Christmas, and party gifts for both adults and children. This will be a big surprise for them. Our warranty covers any defect caused during product production and delivery. We can offer you full refund or free replacement within 30 days and 6 months warranty, whichever is at your most convenience.
body.description: More Fun And Better Than Ever! Newly designed game console is now brighter then ever with a bigger screen. Pre-installed 270 classic retro games, you can basically enjoy all the wonderful 8-bit retro games. The artificial appearance design and buttons layout make you enjoy the game more smoothly.Enjoy in the ocean of games.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.7 3.7 out of 5 stars 1,311 ratings 3.7 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Welcome to the Great Boy store.This game console is a powerful and very interesting game console.It has a large 3.0-inch full color screen, rechargeable lithium battery, micro USB port,direction rocker, TV AV port/headphone port,support 2 players.It has 270 classic games pre-installed, it is suitable to follow you in and out of any occasion,even the ends of the earth. As a gift for children, friends, parents,on birthdays, holidays and other beautiful moments are perfect.

More Fun And Better Than Ever! Newly designed game console is now brighter then ever with a bigger screen. Pre-installed 270 classic retro games, you can basically enjoy all the wonderful 8-bit retro games. The artificial appearance design and buttons layout make you enjoy the game more smoothly.Enjoy in the ocean of games. Specifications Dimensions:L*W*H 6.3*2.8*0.8 inches Pre-installed games: 270 retro games Battery: Rechargeable li-ion battery Players: Support 2 players Charging port: Micro USB Charging time: 1 hours Battery Endurance time: 4-6 hours Material: Non-toxic ABS Plastic

Just Like You Remember! A large number of classic retro games pre-installed.Inspired by the 80's game classic, the game console will allow you to re-live and share great memories alongside a new generation of kids!

Rechargeable,Use Peace of Mind Built-in rechargeable lithium battery,eliminates the hassle of buying and replacing batteries frequently,entertainment kids convenient parents. Using a standard Micro USB charging interface,compatible with most electronic device adapters.Plug and play with power bank even without a battery installed. Charging one hour can play for 4-6 hours.With low battery reminder function and full-charge indicator color change function (indicator light turns red is full-charge). Hook Up to TV Connect to your TV via AV out, you can easily enjoy vivid and exciting video games in a big screen. When you are on vacation at home, you can have a parent-child interaction with your kids.Both adults and children can be immersed in the joyous world of the games. Support TV format:NTSC.Compatible with most TVs. Support 2 Players Some games are support 2 player .Some of these games can be played by 2 people at the same time, and some are 2 people in turn.Note that when running a two-player game, you need to insert the game controller first, and then run the game, press the select key to select the two-player mode. Support Headset This game console has a 3.5MM universal headphone jack, which compatible with most of the headphones on the market.This allows you to enjoy the game calmly and quietly in public and avoid disturbing people around you.

Surprisingly Beautiful Gift As a gift, we believe that this little device will not disappoint you.It exceed your expectations with signature quality and excellence. We believe that kids come first. That's why we aim to create outstanding, innovative toys that provide learning opportunities through play. Package Contains 1 x Game console 1 x User Manual 1 x Gamepad 1 x Li-ion Battery 1 x USB Cable 1 x AV cable Specially designed retail gift box Friendly Reminder Before using the product, please read the instructions carefully. Do not short circuit battery contacts or dispose of batteries in fire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This console is GREAT!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this console for my 10 year old nephew and he loved it! It’s very affordable and the games are very fun. My nephew loves it and I hope he keeps on loving it so next year I can surprise him with a switch😊😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 4 year old to play on the car and it's junk. The quality is terrible and it's very difficult to navigate games. Do yourself a favor and keep shopping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son has Autism Spectrum and I wanted something that could help him along the way with his behavior. So, I bought this game boy and gave it a try. My son love it!. It has so many features and games. It comes with a console and plug for you to transfer to your tv. And it allows up to two players. Battery life is great! And the price is right!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Screen not great
reviews.reviewText: To view the screen is not that great as it shows on the advertisement, everything is so small and hard to find the games. You have this long small list of games they include on it. Not a great purchase for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The controller doesn’t really work
reviews.reviewText: I liked the shooting games and sports

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this portability of this gamer and it makes a great present! I don’t let my boys play online gaming yet so these have been fantastic and they love that it looks like the expensive controllers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Charging port always breaks
reviews.reviewText: My kids have very limited screen time so they aren’t playing this very often, but this game for the 2nd time has broke because we cannot charge it. We had one it broke almost immediately, we replaced it and after 6 months of not playing it we went to charge it and it will not charge unless we’re holding the charger in the unit. The game itself is great. It just breaks very easily
Stopped working within a week. It has to be plugged in in order to turn on and then it freezes altogether. Very disappointing
pas vraiment comme sur la photo, c'est correct, mais sans plus..ca occupe mon garcon durant les voyage...attention l'écran se grafigne facilement.
Moins bonne qualité et durée pas très longue
Cheap quality and graphics are terrible.My 4 year old likes it and keeps him occupied on road trips so worth it
